title: 75/150. Observer status for the Global Dryland Alliance in the General Assembly
text:
United Nations 
A/RES/75/150
 
 
General Assembly 
Distr.: General 
22 December 2020 
 
 
20-17238 (E)    291220 
*2017238* 
 
 
Seventy-fifth session 
Agenda item 183 
Observer status for the Global Dryland Alliance in the 
General Assembly  
 
 
 
 
 Resolution adopted by the General Assembly 
on 15 December 2020 
 
 
 
 
[on the report of the Sixth Committee (A/75/451, para. 8)] 
 
 
 75/150. Observer status for the Global Dryland Alliance in the 
General Assembly 
 
 
 
The General Assembly, 
 
Wishing to promote cooperation between the United Nations and the Global 
Dryland Alliance, 
 
1. 
Decides to invite the Global Dryland Alliance to participate in the sessions 
and the work of the General Assembly in the capacity of observer; 
 
2. 
Requests the Secretary-General to take the action necessary to implement 
the present resolution. 
 
45th plenary meeting 
15 December 2020

paragraphs.1: Decides to invite the Global Dryland Alliance to participate in the sessions and the work of the General Assembly in the capacity of observer;
paragraphs.2: Requests the Secretary-General to take the action necessary to implement the present resolution. 45th plenary meeting 15 December 2020
